36typedef struct mlx_io_vtable_ {
37 bool (*is_open)(void*);
38 bool (*good)(void*);
39 size_t (*tell)(void*);

44 const char* (*label)(void*);
45 void (*free)(void*);
46} mlx_io_vtable;
